title: Chicken livers wrapped in a spiced omelette with a fennel and onion salad
description: An Indian-style omelette served with a fresh salad. Take care when cooking the chicken livers - it's essential they are properly cooked through, but will taste bitter if overcooked.
ingredients: 1 tomato, cut into four and sliced
1 mango, peeled, stone removed, flesh chopped
1 x 2.5cm/1in piece fresh ginger, peeled and finely chopped
5-6 garlic cloves, peeled and finely minced
1 heaped tbsp finely chopped fresh coriander
salt and freshly ground black pepper
